summary: in a4 we'll get to see tony stark deal with the fact that the latest dream of happiness he allowed himself to have turned into...
body: in a4 we’ll get to see tony stark deal with the fact that the latest dream of happiness he allowed himself to have turned into just another PTSD trigger cause like. this kid that reminded him he wanted kids of his own literally died & vanished in his arms and tony didnt, tony had to live on with the knowledge that despite all the time he spent perfecting his nano armor to keep him and the family he wants to start with pepper safe, it still fell short, it still wasnt enough, and maybe he starts to think it isnt the best idea for him to bring a kid into this world if he cant fucking protect it,,,,, tony and his fucking guilt, God. how the fuck is he still sane and Alive

title: Need you like oxygen
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MTnYcT

by MissZayla

When Wanda messed with Steve’s head he realized he still needed Bucky. He needed him like air…He needed to find him.

Words: 734, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

summary:
[Tony agreed to accompany Bucky but only if he can check him over for weapons]
Tony: Barnes, where’s the dagger?
Bucky: [smirks]...
body:
[Tony agreed to accompany Bucky but only if he can check him over for weapons]

Tony: Barnes, where’s the dagger?

Bucky: [smirks] You’re welcome to search for it, but you’ll have to be very thorough.

tags: I just always imagine the Spider-Man flavour to be strawberry
and I’m not a big fan
I’m just projecting onto Tony with that so apologies
summary: You know how ice cream is usually a go to comfort food? Tony definitely always buys Peter a tub of the Ben & Jerry’s flavour...
body: You know how ice cream is usually a go to comfort food? Tony definitely always buys Peter a tub of the Ben & Jerry’s flavour named after Spider-Man after a rough day, because it always brings a smile to his face, and that’s always worth it no matter how bad the flavour.

reblog.comment: You know how ice cream is usually a go to comfort food? Tony definitely always buys Peter a tub of the Ben & Jerry’s flavour named after Spider-Man after a rough day, because it always brings a smile to his face, and that’s always worth it no matter how bad the flavour.

blog.description: Does whatever a spidermeme can. A Peter x MJ text blog, requests are open. Also some random spiderman posts, and venom’s here too. Icon courtesy of @tinagodstein on twitter. Masterlist: https://petermjtexts.tumblr.com/post/178704903813/masterlist

summary: So I keep thinking about Pt. 2
body:
So I keep thinking about Pt. 2

Peter being the perfect blend of human and spider. Cause he is, right? And I can imagine Bruce doing a test to find out how much spider he is and discreetly telling Tony, hey you have to watch out for this kid. He’s the perfect genetic experiment. If anyone (oscorp) got their hands on him they’d tear him apart and make him a lab rat. And Tony’s like, shit. He takes extra care to watch oscorp and make sure they stay far away from his kid.

title: incorrect marvel
body:
Tony: What is this?
Steve: This is my Christmas card. It's a picture of you and me and Pepper on a ski trip, having a blast. Ski-son's greetings
Tony: No, see, we never went on a ski trip
Steve: I know, I know
Tony: I went on a ski trip, two years ago, with Pepper
Steve: Uh, yes, but what you didn't realize at the time was that I was with you, in a sense. I was in your heart

blog.name: strangemischief
blog.title: What Strange Trickery This Is
blog.description: Ironstrange + Supremefamily | Occasional Thor or Loki Content | Side Blog | Tag List | Ao3

summary: 20 Moments Stephen Strange Thinks of Often 1. Chasing his sister in the rain. Not yet being old enough to care that he was wet...
body:
20 Moments Stephen Strange Thinks of Often

1. Chasing his sister in the rain. Not yet being old enough to care that he was wet or that others were watching.

2. Holding a scalpel for the first time. Making a clean, straight slice on smooth skin. 

3. Kissing Tony on the icy sidewalk outside the Sanctum.

4. The first time he saw magic. The moment he felt hope for the first time in months.

5. Tony, clad in the Iron Man armor, landing in front of his fallen form. Tony fighting Thanos. Tony being stabbed, his blood dripping onto the sandy ground of Titan. “Stop.”

6. Dozing in the warm bath water. Tony’s back against his chest, fingers tracing patterns on his palms.  

7. Dinners and dancing and drinking. An empty smile on his face as he hurriedly shakes hands, rushing to move onto bigger, better things. Everyone wanting to stop the talented Dr. Strange.

8. Agony. Overwhelming. Consuming. Instantaneous. Gone. “Dormammu!”

9. Futures racing past his eyes. Tony dying. Peter dying. Him dying. All of them dying. Over, and over, and over again.

10. May sobbing hysterically at Peter’s graduation. Tony smiling proudly, hand squeezing his tightly.

11. Rolling. Spinning. Falling. Glass. Blood. The scent of fuel in the air. The sound of a car horn droning on in the background. Pain. 

12. The library. Unread books being shoved from the writing desk as Tony suggested a much better use for the surface. 

13. Dark eyes, wide with fear and pain, fixing him with a pleading look. To fix it. To say it’d be okay. “It was the only way.”

14. Snow collecting in his hair. Ice biting into his bare flesh. Frigid winds ripping through his thin grey garments. The cool metal of the sling ring freezing his skin as he desperately moved his hand in a practiced circle. 

15. Tony pulling gloves from scarred hands. Warm, tender kisses pressed into every finger.

16. Darkness and despair and drinking. Cerulean eyes staring emptily at the filthy stoop in Katmandu. No one stopping, no one caring about the broken Stephen Strange. 

17. Gasping sharply, lungs begging for air. “You’re alright, douchebag” Tony reassured, slipping the Time stone back into the Eye. “It’s over.”

18. Flakes of snow hovering in the sky, a sense of dread pulling at his heart. “It’s not about you.”

19. Warm summer sunshine streaming through sheer drapes, bathing their nude forms in golden light. The breathtaking beauty of tanned skin glowing against white sheets. 

20. “Stark-Strange!” Tony protests. “Strange-Stark,” he disagrees with a grin.

15. Tony pulling gloves from scarred hands. Warm, tender kisses pressed into every finger.

16. Darkness and despair and drinking. Cerulean eyes staring emptily at the filthy stoop in Katmandu. No one stopping, no one caring about the broken Stephen Strange. 

17. Gasping sharply, lungs begging for air. “You’re alright, douchebag” Tony reassured, slipping the Time stone back into the Eye. “It’s over.”

18. Flakes of snow hovering in the sky, a sense of dread pulling at his heart. “It’s not about you.”

19. Warm summer sunshine streaming through sheer drapes, bathing their nude forms in golden light. The breathtaking beauty of tanned skin glowing against white sheets. 

20. “Stark-Strange!” Tony protests. “Strange-Stark,” he disagrees with a grin.

summary:
tony stark: i’m not sentimental lol
also tony stark: keeps machines he made at MIT even though he can make better ones, keeps...
body:
tony stark: i’m not sentimental lol

also tony stark: keeps machines he made at MIT even though he can make better ones, keeps fanart and cards from little kids, the whole ‘tony stark has a heart’ fiasco, probably cries when peter throws out a shirt he’s grown out of,,

blog.name: plussizeappreciationfics
blog.title: PlusSizeAppreciationFics
blog.description: Emmanuelle ✊🏾 l 18+ only l Semi break I FAQ l Rules/GL l Masterlists

tags: tony stark x plus size reader
title: Headcanon: Keep you sane
body:
Requested by anonymous: Plus size reader with ADHD x Tony? She’s actually very smart but needs to stim a lot, and gets bored easily so she’s a bit of a spaz,impulsive to the core and a bad self image so when one of the Avengers comments on her weight and her stimming the RSD kicks in and she shuts down, for days trying to act “normal”,no stims, no hyperfocus, no random word waterfalls. Until she hits a meltdown, snapping at people,which makes things worse as they comment on it. Only tony calms her down ..love ur blog💞

Pairing: Plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): mention of crying

Word count: 745

~~~



-Your hyperactive disorder was something you struggled with on a daily basis, on top of that you were also very insecure and didn’t understand why Tony was your boyfriend and why. To him, you were the most beautiful woman he’d ever seen and he loved everything about you, your mental disorder included

-Tony did his very best into making you feel comfortable around him and the other team members. He was very patient and used to your sudden outbursts when you weren’t able to focus on one task, impulsive actions which sometimes led to a little chaos in the tower, or your stimming would kick in, making you repeat the physical movement, sounds, or words over and over again

-Tony always tried his best to distract you (and most of the time succeeded) and never got annoyed or angry at you. “the disorder is what completes you and I could never repulse anything about you” was the sentence that your boyfriend said when you felt like crying in a corner because you felt like the whole world was against you

-Most of the times, the avengers were used to your disorder but sometimes it got a little too much which never ended good. Natasha once had a bad week and when you confessed to her that you had accidentally ripped one of her suits in the locker room in the middle of an anger outburst, she lost it and yelled at you. “Can’t you act normal for one time?!” she screamed which made the tears immediately brim your eyes

-She stomped away and didn’t listen to your apology, you felt so ashamed, especially when Clint mumbled a low “Weirdo” before following Natasha which really hurt your feelings. You ran to your and Tony’s shared bedroom and cried while pacing and rubbing your right arm for hours until you were exhausted and ready to go to sleep and call it a day

-Tony knew about the incident when he returned later on in the evening and hated that he wasn’t there to calm you down and reassure you that Natasha and Clint didn’t really meant what they said, that their anger was talking for them. It was true, they both felt so bad later on, especially when Friday informed them that you had locked and soundproof your room so that no one could hear your cries

-The following day, you woke up and tried to be as normal as possible. You were able to harshly bite down on your lower lip to refrain yourself from starting to repeat a word over and over again. You tried to sit completely still and not fidget or rub your arm (which you always did) and tried your best to focus what was happening around you

-Tony saw what you were doing and it broke his heart, he was so angry at Natasha and Clint for making you feel so bad about your disorder and try to act as normal as possible. You were able to act “normal” from the morning until afternoon before you completely snapped and broke down

-You don’t know what triggered your breakdown but the next thing you knew, you were a lying on the floor of your bedroom, trembling and quivering while gasping for air as loud sobs left your body

-Friday had alerted Tony of your breakdown and it took him a minute to rush to you where he immediately engulfed you in a soothing hug while whispering sweet words in your ear. The whole team was watching from the open door and their hearts broke in their chests as they realized how they their actions were affecting you

-They had never really seen you have a complete melt down and it brought Natasha to tears as she realized that she was the reason behind it. Tony was able to calm you down (although it took him over an hour) and put you to sleep as you had no energy left

-After taking a four-hour nap, you woke up to Natasha and Clint handing you over an apology gift while the rest of the team stood around the bed. One by one, they all apologized and promised to help you through your struggle instead of getting irritated or mad. After they left, Tony joined you beneath the covers and held you close to him while pressing tender kisses against your lips while repeating how much he loved you and would never let you go


Tag list: @jamesbarnesappreciationsociety  l @pleasantdreamqueen l @disneymarina l @koizorahana l l @harleycativy l @itik-angsa l @sparklemichele l @melaninmarvel l @amethyst09 l @the-force-of-imagines l @bossyboyd03 l @enigmaticaphrodite l @pebblesz892 l @stars8melanin l @brittyevans l @toc1985 l @janeyboo l @badassbaker l @earthtocynthia l @lafayettes-baguettes-1 l @winters-beauty l @cannonindeez  l @ilovefanfic86 l @foureyedsiopao l @adorablespecialsnowflakes l @brittanyovens l @kanupps06 l @jazmynejack l @oliviajmarvel l @thebookwormslytherin l @theunsweetenedtruth l @talannalew l @littlexmissxfandomxlover l @amethyst-dreams-and-candy-canes l @dedebebe13 l @challaxkillmonger l @crimsonash330 l @booklover2929 l @aranelgrey l @panda-duuu l @thisismysecrethappyplace l @killmonsgyal l @lokislilcaribbeanprincess l @titty-teetee l @honey-anon l @queenxchallaxkillamonger

-Emma 💋❤️

blog.name: bitter--baristas
blog.title: Drabbles and Fanfiction
blog.description: Taking ficlet requests for: Ducktales, The Moomins, Tintin and Constantine (2005 version).

summary: “You know, sometimes I feel like I was born with a leak, and any goodness I started with just slowly spilled out of me, and now...
caption:
“You know, sometimes I feel like I was born with a leak, and any goodness I started with just slowly spilled out of me, and now it’s all gone. And I’ll never get it back in me. It’s too late.”

–Bojack Horseman, season 1: Horse Majeure

reblog.comment:
“You know, sometimes I feel like I was born with a leak, and any goodness I started with just slowly spilled out of me, and now it’s all gone. And I’ll never get it back in me. It’s too late.”

–Bojack Horseman, season 1: Horse Majeure

blog.title: AurumAcadicus
blog.description: Previously Reioka. Lowly Marvel Erotica Blog. Reioka on AO3. On hiatus but currently accepting commissions!

summary: Honestly can we all just thank AvAc for the Tony Stark/Janet Van Dyne friendship. (Also can we thank AvAc for making Janet ready...
body:
Honestly can we all just thank AvAc for the Tony Stark/Janet Van Dyne friendship. (Also can we thank AvAc for making Janet ready to Throw Down when it comes to Tony.) Tony’s adorable and oblivious and knows Jan loves him the way he is and Jan will protect that with her life.

“Be mean to Tony? I didn’t realize you wanted your ass beat today. I’ll give you to the count of three to apologize to him sincerely.”

“But Jan I can’t get across campus in three seconds–”

“SHOULD HAVE THOUGHT OF THAT BEFORE YOU WERE MEAN TO MY BESTIE THEN SHOULDN’T YOU? ONE-TWO-THREE IT’S ASS-BEATING TIME.”
